greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integers k in range [n^2, ((n+1)^2)-1] for which 4 = the least number of squares that add up to k (A002828).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..512
program: (define (add intfun lowlim uplim) (let sumloop ((i lowlim) (res 0)) (cond ((> i uplim) res) (else (sumloop (1+ i) (+ res (intfun i)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 04 2016
